welcomeText: Welcome to Mars! Now you can finally book the holidays of your dream with our ultra luxurious packages, designed just for you! Let yourself forgot about the problems of global warming, capitalism, clash of classes and all the other problems, by simply removing yourself from the Earth. Click onto next page, to pick a date, then chose right form of spoiling yourself while on the Red Planet and finally send us all the money, which you totally don't need. You deserve to treat yourself!
